availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry S. Parrish (Clark County, Kentucky, soldier)

body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Ella Quisenberry Parrish. First lieutenant and captain of the 20th Kentucky Infantry from May 1862 to June 1864.

ab.bibl:
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 398. (accessed on May 16, 2017)
Find A Grave, "Henry S. Parrish (Birth-February 29, 1892)," Memorial #101044732, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/101044732 (accessed on May 16, 2017).
